mapper.sql: id, user_id, username, paper_id, paper_name, subject_id, subject_name, score, total_score, accuracy, duration, exam_time, answers
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exam_record (user_id, username, paper_id, paper_name, subject_id, subject_name, score, total_score, accuracy, duration, exam_time, answers) VALUES (#{userId}, #{username}, #{paperId}, #{paperName}, #{subjectId}, #{subjectName}, #{score}, #{totalScore}, #{accuracy}, #{duration}, NOW(), #{answers,jdbcType=VARCHAR,typeHandler=com.example.handler.JsonTypeHandler})
mapper.update: UPDATE exam_record SET user_id = #{userId}, username = #{username}, paper_id = #{paperId}, paper_name = #{paperName}, subject_id = #{subjectId}, subject_name = #{subjectName}, score = #{score}, total_score = #{totalScore}, accuracy = #{accuracy}, duration = #{duration}, exam_time = NOW(), answers = #{answers,jdbcType=VARCHAR,typeHandler=com.example.handler.JsonTypeHandler} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM exam_record WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY exam_time DESC
SELECT FROM exam_record WHERE subject_id = #{subjectId} ORDER BY exam_time DESC
SELECT FROM exam_record WHERE exam_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY exam_time DESC
